title: Drawing, Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Square Nosegays over Blue Floral Background, ca. 1900–30
title_raw: Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Square Nosegays over Blue Floral Background
medium: Watercolor, graphite on heavy cream paper
description: Alternating small and large square posies of pink and purple flowers with large central rose and green leaves on blue background of stripped rows and (dogwood?) flowers.  Graphite guidleines for placement and graphite underdrawing remain visible, especially in lighter areas.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Square Nosegays over Blue Floral Background, ca. 1900–30. Watercolor, graphite on heavy cream paper. 
Gift of Joseph E. Bostany. 1996-26-2
